page.title: 19SOCIAL CONCERNS KING'S NYM.
page.content: {PARISH HALL}The village lacks a modren hall or centre for holding meetings and large functions.A committee has been set up for the purpose of acquiring a site and to raise funds for its purchase and for the building. Outline planning permission has been granted on the land adjacent and to the west of the parish playing field. On 22nd.July 1985 the proposed plans for the new hall were on view to the public and comments were invited. The building as on this plan would include public toilets which would have separate access,an amenity which the village does not have at present. {COUNTY ROADS }The Parish Council has received plans of proposed road classifications in the county. Concern is felt for the low grade given to the road leading south from the village to the main Exeter -Barnstaple road.
